articles.author: Investor's Business Daily
articles.title: Tesla 2024 Earnings Estimates Keep Coming Down. The EV Giant Is Now Hiking Vehicle Prices. - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Tesla announced Saturday plans to raise Model Y prices in the U.S. and Europe.
articles.content: Tesla (TSLA) announced over the weekend it will increase U.S. Model Y prices on April 1 while also hiking Model Y prices in Europe on March 22. Meanwhile, the global EV giant is also currently offeri… [+3866 chars]
